UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Maculatin 1.1, an anti-microbial peptide from the Australian tree frog, Litoria genimaculata solution structure and biological activity.
Literature.Author: Chia BC, Carver JA, Mulhern TD, Bowie JH

Literature.Title: Structure-activity relationship of an antibacterial peptide, maculatin 1.1, from the skin glands of the tree frog, Litoria genimaculata.
Literature.Author: Niidome T, Kobayashi K, Arakawa H, Hatakeyama T, Aoyagi H

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus cereus(MIC=>100µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=>100µg/ml),Leuconostoc lactis(MIC=12µg/ml),Listeria innocua(MIC=100µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus(MIC=50µg/ml),Pasteurella multocida(MIC=>100µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=50-100µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=100µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=>100µg/ml),Streptococcus uberis(MIC=50µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus IFO 12732(MIC=4µM),Bacillus subtilis IFO 3134(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli IFO 12734(MIC=>64µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa IFO 12582(MIC=>64µM)
